txt.en: \qThe Jolly Hunter\q is said to have been written by an elderly hobbit-hunter. In it, he details what led to his exceptionally long life.

You have heard it whispered that the libraries of Moria yet contain many tomes, while many other volumes were brought by the dwarves seeking to reclaim their ancient realm. One such tome in their libraries is said to be the legendary \qThe Jolly Hunter.\q If you can gain enough favour with the Iron Garrison Guards, they may let you have their copy of this book.
